meaning_str.bing:
v. 烧伤；燃烧；烫伤；烧着
n. 烧伤；烫伤；灼伤；烧（或烫、灼）的痕迹
网络. 烧焦；烧毁；焚烧

烧伤；烫伤；灼伤；烧（或烫、灼）的痕迹

烧；燃烧；使（燃料）燃烧；着火；焚烧；烧焦；使烧焦；烧煳；烧着；烧毁；烧坏；烧死；烧伤；烫伤；灼伤；使晒伤；晒伤；烧制；烧录（数据；光盘等）；消耗（能量）；感到灼热；感到刺痛；火辣辣地痛；发热；发光
烧伤；烫伤；灼伤；烧痕；酸痛感；灼痛；火辣感觉；燃烧造成的损害；能量消耗；溪流；小溪；小河

sogou-kaoyan.v: 燃烧; 烧毁; 烧伤[出现3次)]

sogou-CET6.v/n: 烧毁; 灼伤; 晒伤; 伤疤[出现12次)]

sogou-CET4.v: 燃烧[出现7次)];激动; 兴奋[出现0次)]
sogou-CET4.v/n: 烧毁; 灼伤; 晒伤; 伤疤[出现0次)]

1.en: The course which she trains on is made of pitch, the heat of the surface even can burn her sole.
1.cn: 训练的跑道是沥青的，高温把脚底都要烤焦。

2.en: If it fits, you can burn it to a DVD, or you can use USB Startup Disk Creator to put everything on a flash drive of the appropriate size.
2.cn: 要使用这个文件，你就得把它刻录在一张DVD盘片上，或者通过USB启动盘创建器，把这文件的内容装入一个足够大的U盘里。

3.en: Treatment for an abrasion is similar to that of a burn, since raw skin is exposed to the air and can easily become infected.
3.cn: 擦伤的处理与灼伤的处理类似，因为皮肤里层暴露于空气中，易受感染。

0.en: Love lip-balm? Try applying it 1500 times to burn 200 calories.
0.cn: 喜欢护唇膏吗？擦1500次就可以燃烧200卡路里。

1.en: If you're bored and happen to fall asleep, you'll need over 3 hours to burn the same amount, but you will be burning calories even in your sleep.
1.cn: 如果无聊到睡着，你需要花超过三小时燃烧相同热量，但在睡觉时也会燃烧卡路里。

2.en: He is consumed by it. If he is not stopped, this world will burn.
2.cn: 他被它所侵蚀，如果他没有被阻止，这个世界将会被燃烧。

3.en: For example, why not chew gum for 18 hours to burn off those 200 calories?
3.cn: 例如，为何不花18小时嚼口香糖燃烧200卡路里？

4.en: If things heat up, you only need an hour of sex to burn off 200 calories.
4.cn: 打得火热的话，只需要一小时的爱爱来燃烧200大卡。

5.en: Spend a good 2 and a half hours surfing through channels, and you'll actually burn those 200 calories.
5.cn: 花两个半小时转频道，就可以燃烧200大卡。

6.en: Simply drinking 8 glasses of water will burn an extra 70 calories a day, fresh water that is.
6.cn: 只要喝八杯水，干净的水，每天就可以多燃烧70大卡。

7.en: With their powerful engines, these cars will burn through nearly 10,000 gallons of gasoline, tearing around the track.
7.cn: 它的发动机很强大，装着1万加仑的汽油在跑道上行驶，可能使车身燃烧起来。

8.en: After taking a look at what 200 Food Calories looks like a few weeks ago, we thought: what does it look like to burn these calories off?
8.cn: 前几周看过了200大卡的食物是怎样的，我们想：燃烧这些卡路里又会如何？

9.en: And while 200 calories is an arbitrary number that we chose, a pound of fat is equivalent to roughly 3500 calories. So, burn away!
9.cn: 200大卡只是我们选的数字，一磅的脂肪大约等于3500大卡，所以，尽情燃烧热量。

10.en: Sure, the average person who runs for a good 20 minutes will burn roughly 200 calories, but is that really the most fun way to do it?
10.cn: 不置可否，平均一人跑20分钟，可消耗大概200卡路里，但这是燃烧卡路里最有趣的方法吗？

11.en: Eventually, the universe will run out of gas to form stars, and the stars themselves will run out of fuel and burn out, leaving the universe with only black holes in it.
11.cn: 最终，宇宙将会由于缺少气体而无法形成恒星，同时恒星自身也会燃烧殆尽，宇宙中留下的只会是一个个黑洞。

12.en: And if you touched the ground, burn you.
12.cn: 如果你掉到地面，我会烧掉你。

13.en: Mission, we're in full OMS burn, trying to back out.
13.cn: 控制中心，我们已开动最大马力，意图后退。

14.en: And also, polyester gym shorts don't burn. They melt.
14.cn: 还有，涤纶运动短裤不会烧起来。而是会融化。

15.en: Don't burn it this time. Please? I never go and burn it, man.
15.cn: 这次别再烤焦了，好吗？我从来不干这事，哥们。

17.en: But do you see that? Fire is catching. And if we burn, you burn with us.
17.cn: 但你们看到了吗？熊熊火焰已经点燃，如果我们被点燃，你们必会一起葬身火海。

18.en: How do we know the wire's not gonna burn up? Because I invented it. I assure you, it won't burn up.
18.cn: 我们怎么保证电线不会被烧坏呢？因为这是我发明的，我保证它不会烧坏。

19.en: Oh hey, but that's sad about you though, what happened? What happened? Burn out? Burn all out, did you?
19.cn: 但可惜你要走了，出了什么事？出了什么事？精力耗尽了，精力耗尽了是吗？
